name: travel-api
description: npm install graph ql create index file import graphql ``` const { graphql, buildSchema } = require('graphql'); ``` call graphql ``` graphql(   schema,   query,   rootValue ) ``` create schema variable as buildSchema ``` const schema = buildSchema(``) ``` inside the () we use backticks so it can be multiline. within the backticks we include our types. must always include: type Query.
